Post: This is Dr. Lorna Breen. She was the Emergency Room Director at New York-Presbyterian Hospital. When the COVID-19 pandemic hit in 2020, Dr. Breen was on the frontlines treating COVID patients. She came down with the virus herself – and after taking minimal time to recover, she returned to work. She appeared withdrawn and her family encouraged her to come home, take a break, and seek mental health treatment. Tragically, she later died by suicide.
